articles.title: Exclusive: Biden to waive tariffs for 24 months on solar panels hit by probe - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden will declare a 24-month tariff exemption on Monday for solar panels from four Southeast Asian nations after an investigation froze imports and stalled projects in the United States, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, June 5 (Reuters) - President Joe Biden will declare a 24-month tariff exemption on Monday for solar panels from four Southeast Asian nations after an investigation froze imports and stall… [+4543 chars]

articles.title: Singapore crowned champion at Global Pastry Chef Challenge finals 2022 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: At this international competition organised by Worldchefs (The World Association of Chefs' Societies), Singapore also nabbed second runner-up in the Global Chef Challenge category.
articles.content:
In the Global Pastry Chef Challenge category, Team Singapore had to present a total three creations a chocolate sculpture, a plated dessert and an entremet (a classic French dessert) cake

articles.title: The former ad exec who sells pre-loved toys and launched a cute card game during the pandemic - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this week's instalment of Creative Capital, we meet 45-year-old Italian expatriate Tulika Sahai who not only runs a curated toy company, but also has a platform for selling and buying pre-loved toys.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Meat' Hong Kong's new heartthrob, a butcher who has women, and even men swooning - AsiaOne
